data.name: Commands.Help.Args.Command.Description
data.value: Display help of a specific command

data.name: Commands.CommandNotFound
data.value: Command '{0}' not found. Try 'easysave help' for more information.

data.name: Commands.Help.GeneralHelp.Header
data.value:
EasySave CLI Help Page
Usage: easysave [command] [arguments]
A CLI tool to backup your files
Available commands:

data.name: Commands.Version.Description
data.value: Display the version of the application

data.name: Commands.WrongArgumentCount
data.value: Command expects {0} argument(s), {1} given. Type 'easysave help {2}' for more information.
